fixes.name: Gross Utilization % (Non G11)
fixes.dax_expression: ABS( SUM('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)]) / MAX('migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[Limit (Non G11)]) )
fixes.solution_explanation: Converted Tableau ABS(SUM([Initial Cash USD T (excl Int/FWD)])/MAX([Limit (Non G11)])) to DAX. Mapped SUM and MAX directly and transformed column references to 'migration_Extract_POC (1) (local copy)'[ColumnName] format. Kept ABS for absolute value.
fixes.type_changed_reason: The calculation contains aggregations (SUM and MAX), therefore it must be created as a measure.
